DaD.inventory

Class HeroInventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.inventory.Inventory
      • DaD.inventory.HeroInventory

  • public class HeroInventory
extends Inventory
    Class used by hero to store items and golds. This class extends Inventory.
    See Also:
    ItemInstance

    • Method Detail

      • equip

        public void equip(Hero hero,
                  ItemInstance itemInstance)
        Make the hero Equip this item instance, check full description for important details!

        The function first check if there is an item equipped at the place where we'll equip the new item. If so then we unequip it first and then equip the new one. Then we re-calculate all the stats for the hero.

        Parameters:
        hero - The hero who equip the item
        itemInstance - ItemInstance to equip
        See Also:
        Calculator.calculateAllStats(Hero)

      • unequip

        public void unequip(Hero hero,
                    ItemInstance itemInstance)
        Set item as unequip and calculate Hero stats.
        Parameters:
        hero - The hero that will unequip the item
        itemInstance - Item to equip

      • setEquipped

        public void setEquipped(ItemInstance itemInstance)
        Change the EquipSlot of an ItemInstance to the appropriate value, depending on its GearType.

        Each ItemInstance has an GearType. Depending on this GearType the ItemInstance will be equipped on a specific ItemEquipSlot. Example: An ItemInstance of type GearType.SWORD will be equipped on equip slot right hand.

        Parameters:
        itemInstance - Item to set as equipped

      • setUnequipped

        public void setUnequipped(ItemInstance itemInstance)
        Change ItemEquipSlot of an item to ItemEquipSlot.NONE. This mean the item is unequipped.
        Parameters:
        itemInstance - Item to set as unequipped
